lyrics:
If I Were Your Woman Lyrics[Verse 1]
If I were your woman
And you were my man
You'd have no other woman
You'd be weak as a lamb
If you had the strength
To walk out that door
My love would overrule my sense
And I'd call you back for more

[Bridge]
If I were your woman (if you were my woman)
If I were your woman (if you were my woman)
And you were my man

[Verse 2]
Yeah
She tears you down, darling
Says you're nothing at all (nothing at all)
But I'll pick you up, darling
When she lets you fall
You're like a diamond (shining)
But she treats you like glass
Yet you beg her to love you
But me you don't ask
[Chorus]
If I were your woman (if you were my woman)
If I were your woman (if you were my woman)
If I were your woman (if you were my woman)
Here's what I'd do
I'd never no, no stop loving you
Yeah, yeah, mmm

[Verse 3]
Life is so crazy and love is unkind
Because she came first, darling
Will she hang on your mind?
You're a part of me
And you don't even know it
I'm what you need
But I'm too afraid to show it

[Chorus]
If I were your woman
(If you were my woman)
If I were your woman
If you were my woman
(If I were your woman)
If you were my woman
Here's what I'd do
I'd never no, no stop loving you
[Outro]
If I were your woman
Here's what I'd do
I'd never, never, never stop loving you
If I were your woman
You're sweet loving woman
You'd need no other woman

If you were my woman
If I were your woman
(If you were my woman)
If I were your woman
(If you were my woman)
I'd be you're only woman
You'd have no other woman1Embed
